content: भृंगारः --रं {@--1@} A golden vase or pitcher. {@--2@} A pitcher of a particular shape (<ab>Mar.</ab> झारी); शिशिरसुरभिसलिलपूर्णोयं भृंगारः <ls>Ve. 6.</ls> {@--3@} A vase used at the coronation of a king. --गं {@--1@} Gold. {@--2@} Cloves.
